Title: CASE OF Y. v. SLOVENIA
Conclusion(s): Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Effective investigation) (Procedural aspect)

Non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage Just satisfaction)
